column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The classical satirist Juvenal once wrote that all the Roman people needed was bread and circuses. Now
column2: this was a bit condescending to the Romans
column3: implying that a loaf and a gladiator fight were enough to buy the people
column5: if that loaf of bread came from Common Bond
column6: then it might just be enough to accompany our own local circus (also known as the Houston Texans).
